import time import nipyapi import sys nipyapi.config.nifi_config.host = '${nifi.url}/nifi-api' #Queues can be large - increase timeout nipyapi.config.short_max_wait = 3600
# process group id pg_id = '${pg.id}' # GetHDFS process in the process group GetHDFS_id = '${gethdfs.id}' # directory to merge variable_key = 'directory.to.merge' # directory_to_merge = '/dw_prod/ods/laimi/laimi/t_sales_bill/partition__=20190503'
def waitForGetHDFSFinish(GetHDFS_id): GetHDFS = nipyapi.canvas.get_processor(identifier=GetHDFS_id, identifier_type='id') last_output = GetHDFS.status.aggregate_snapshot.output while True: print('-- Wait for GetHDFS finish, sleep 2 seconds.') time.sleep(2) # sleep first GetHDFS = nipyapi.canvas.get_processor(identifier=GetHDFS_id, identifier_type='id') active_thread_count = GetHDFS.status.aggregate_snapshot.active_thread_count cur_output = GetHDFS.status.aggregate_snapshot.output if active_thread_count == 0 and cur_output == last_output: break else: last_output = cur_output
def waitForMergeFinish(pg_id): while True: print('-- Wait for finsih, sleep 2 seconds.') time.sleep(2) pg = nipyapi.canvas.get_process_group(identifier=pg_id, identifier_type='id') if pg.status.aggregate_snapshot.queued_count == '0': break
def merge(directory_to_merge): global pg_id, GetHDFS_id, variable_key # set directory pg = nipyapi.canvas.get_process_group(identifier=pg_id, identifier_type='id') nipyapi.canvas.update_variable_registry(process_group=pg, update=[[variable_key, directory_to_merge]]) print('-- Directory set.')
# start GetHDFS GetHDFS = nipyapi.canvas.get_processor(identifier=GetHDFS_id, identifier_type='id') isStart = nipyapi.canvas.schedule_processor(processor=GetHDFS, scheduled=True, refresh=True) if not isStart: print('start error') sys.exit(-1) print('-- GetHDFS started.')
# Wait for GetHDFS finish waitForGetHDFSFinish(GetHDFS_id=GetHDFS_id)
# start process group isStart = nipyapi.canvas.schedule_process_group(process_group_id=pg_id, scheduled=True) if not isStart: print('start error') sys.exit(-1) print('-- Start merging.')
# wait for finsih waitForMergeFinish(pg_id=pg_id)
isStop = nipyapi.canvas.schedule_process_group(process_group_id=pg_id, scheduled=False) print('-- Finish? %s' % isStop)
from hdfs3 import HDFileSystem import re
fs = HDFileSystem(host='${namenode.host}', port=8020) ods_root_dir = '${ods.root.dir}'
def hasSmallFile(files): for f in files: if not f.endswith('.avro'): return True return False
def isHistorical(directory): from datetime import datetime today = datetime.now().strftime('%Y%m%d') if directory.split('=')[1] < today: return True return False
def getHistoricalDirectories(ods_root_dir): needed_merge_dirs = [] for d in fs.walk(ods_root_dir): subdirs = d[1] subfiles = d[2] # if len(subdirs) == 0 and hasSmallFile(subfiles): cur_path = d[0] # if isHistorical(cur_path): needed_merge_dirs.append(cur_path) return needed_merge_dirs
needed_merge_dirs = getHistoricalDirectories(ods_root_dir)
total = len(needed_merge_dirs) cnt = 0 for d in needed_merge_dirs: cnt += 1 print('----------- Total: %d, cnt: %d, prepare to merge path: %s' % (total, cnt, d)) merge(d)
